text: Walter Michael Poddubny (February 14, 1960 – March 21, 2009) was a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger and coach who played eleven seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL) from 1981–1982 until 1991–1992. He died of a heart attack at the age of 49, after collapsing at his sister's house in Thunder Bay. ==Career statistics== ===Ice hockey=== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G
